alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 11:40AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Crittenden, northeastern DeSoto and southern Shelby Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Memphis, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Marion, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Southwest Memphis, Southeast Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Lewisburg, Whitehaven, Midtown Memphis, Lynchburg, Piperton, Mound City, Cedarview and Amanea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
